original:
'High Value Metrics is proud to present it's latest HVM weapons line!' 
a broad number of images of weapons are placed across the flier, 
a picture of a pistol named HVM 001, 
a frail looking SMG named HVM 002, 
a sturdy but clunky assault rifle named HVM 005 G-Class, 
a very heavy looking LMG called HVM 008, 
and a shotgun across the background with 'HVM 004, where nanomaterials make the impossible come reality' written under it as 25 shotgun shells are placed under it, 
all weapons have green and light brown digital pattern camo panels ontop of very dark gray internals.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
translation:
“High Value Metrics公司为您荣誉展示最新的HVM系列武器！”
这张传单上印有大量的武器图片。
一张名为HVM 001的手枪图片。
一把看起来很不结实的冲锋枪，名为HVM 002。
一把结实但笨重的突击步枪，名为HVM 005 G-Class。
一把看起来非常笨重的轻机枪，名为HVM 008。
一把霰弹枪横在背景上，下面写着 "HVM 004，纳米材料，使不可能成为可能"，25枚霰弹枪弹被放在枪支的前面。
所有的武器都有绿色和浅棕色的数字图案迷彩和深灰色的底色。

<info> Xeno的SAS4武器包Mod</info>

Z-5重型机枪是以Stone LMG 96为基础的。它的弹药箱似乎是从右侧供给的，与大多数现实中的LMG相仿。然而，这使得Z-5看起来像另一种现实中的轻机枪，叫做Stoner LMG 86。它的盖子上有 "Z-5 "的字样。它的枪托和前握上有划痕和一些胶布，这意味着这把枪的状况很差，但仍然可以使用。

这把武器<bad>制作不良</bad>，而且<bad>容易出现故障</bad>，<bad>不适合近战使用</bad>

the Z-5 Heavy is described as 'Powerful machine gun ideal for suppressing enemy positions.' produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>
the Z-5 Heavy is based on Stone LMG 96. Its ammo box is appeared to be fed from the right side, mirrored to most real-life LMGs. However, this makes Z-5 look like another real-life MG called Stoner LMG 86. It has the word 'Z-5' on its cover latch. It has scratches but most of the damage has been fixed and will definitely work better, it has also been reinforced with metal strips and it's barrel has been also upgraded.

This weapon is <good>reinforced</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>
